title: Scanning files won't stop
body: still scanning files, I'm at 1000 files, WHY WON'T IT STOP

replies.body:
Hey everyone,

I want to help :)

We had a hotfix pushed out yesterday that could have potentially caused the scanning to trigger. Please send me your latest patcher logs so I can investigate. Make sure to send me logs that are greater than 7kb in filesize. 

Here's how:
https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/27495980-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq6
Where do I send the logs?
You can attach them to your post (the little paperclip icon) :)
Dunno if this is one of the right logs, but this is the last log file I have. I changed it from .log1 to .log so I can attach it
Reinstalled the game, but the installing doesn't go past 33% and is scanning files like before...

No clue if this is correct. I deleted everything related to League earlier, and tried to re-install it completely. I have a bigger file, but it says it is to large. This one is is 31kb..hope it helps.  Also the re-install did not sort out the problem.

If you would like to see a larger patch log, I have one in my support ticket.

I actually got a hold of player support and got your logs from them. The logs PS has are from when you installed the game from scratch. 

I would need logs that are generated when you encounter the lengthy scanning files phase.

Thank you for sending them though!
Also if the files are too big to upload here just upload them to a dropbox and send me the link. Make sure permissions are set so I can view them. Thanks :)

Sadly I don't have a copy of those files :{. I hope that when you guys get that issue fixed I didn't mess up my chance to fix my client. If it helps at all it always  stops at "230mb" every time, and it says ( 0 kbs ). Once again sorry I didn't think re-installing the game would cause an issue since I was still running into a problem.
I'm having the same problem even 11 months later is there an easy fix? (it's also for PBE)
i dunno if I've done it right :/ every time it updates it always tells me to scan files, my friends wait for me for like an hour+

Here are my Logs, thanks!

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzgZWasFus5CQ1BXZUtsU0U4XzA/view?usp=sharing

I am having the same issue... yesterday I was able to play just fine but today for some reason the patcher got stuck and gave me this error message. I googled "fixes" but none of them worked. I am using a PC not a mac and I have never had problems with the patcher.
I hope Riot fixes this soon...

Here's link to the fix https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2_AZgta8aGI

Here's comment that helped:

hey guys if you still have probs  delete again : ==> downloads and solution / then  you have to copy the S_OK from the folder => \projects\lol_launcher\releases\0.0.0.223      / there you have the thing named S_OK  !  Copy that thing and paste it in     =>projects\lol_game_client\releases\0.0.0.253 and in=>projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.112 ! if you did it step by step you have to !!! run!!! ==> lol.launcher.admin      then it should load over 33 % and if  you start stucking at 57 % like me you have to wait quite a bit because another option i dont know!!  I hope i could  help you with all that patching stress it took me 3 days ..... but this video helped me a bit  .... if this doesnt helped you im sorry for you because i know how you feel D:
I just had this problem (again) and was ready to have to do a full reinstall.  This is the ONLY thing that has actually worked for me. Thank you for this!
Thank you so much for this.
Uh..... 4000 files scanned, 40 minutes, stuck at 33% Patch 5.5 :(
I got to 10k files and closed it....I just freakin reinstalled league two and a half weeks ago! Why is this happening?! Rito please! I just wanna get back to jungling {{champion:80}}
My league wont reinstall now....great :(
I have the same issue, it just stops at 230mb ( 0 kbs ) no matter what I do :/
yeah i have tried a ton of "solutions" but nothing works
At 5k, about 3 times...... Tried opening as administrator, allowing through firewall... tried everything... WHY...... WHY DO I HAVE TO GO THROUGH THIS :(
Did you try uninstalling and reinstalling? Also try booting the comptuer in safe mode with networking.

I tried a re-patch which was under patch issues, it didn't work at first, so i went and deleted the "locale.properties" file ( out of sheer curiosity) and it got my client past 33%, ( up in the 80s so far, still downloading). My guess is that it is just a late effect of the re-patch, but I'm just glad its at least downloading now. The top now says " updating game files" so i hope that's reinstalling all the files and everything  I messed with.

I tried to reinstall the game completely deleting anything related to league, nothing worked, and booting in safe mode with networking didn't do anything either..It just completely stops at 230mb left..it looks like this.

Fix: I looked under troubleshooting patches forum. There was a troubleshoot of " re-installing patch" ( https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/28732434-Patching-Issues) which at first did not work for me. I then tried deleting just one file, the "locale.properties" file, which got my client past 33% and still downloading. I don't know if that file was an important one, or if the client will reinstall it, but for now it seems to be working.

I also cannot re-install League of Legends and I do not know why, this started happening after that little patch and ever sense I tried everything and it doesn't work at all Riot please I can't even install your game!
Yep, having this issue now.

Posting to join the comment parade. Was fine Monday, and today get the files scanning at 33% like it's doing a total file scan.  I tried all previous fixes. I even tried a complete uninstall and file deletion to make sure nothing was there. After it patched in the adobe air client it went into scanning files again. I highly doubt we will see a red comment on here.

Edit: Manually adding a firewall inbound exception rule for the League Launcher seems to have fixed the issue for me.

My file are keep scanning its 6000 files now and still counting its not stopping
Whats the problem can anybody help

My files are scaning for 1 hour now its 6000 files (still counting)its still going 
Whats happening whats the problem can anybody help

I am having similar issues with patch 5.21... Help would be appreciated.
[]
(http://file:///C:/Riot%20Games/League%20of%20Legends/RADS/rads_user_kernel.log)
Mine stopped at about 1500 and start updating
4000 files scanned and still at 33%!
still scanning file,im at 20,000 files,why won't it stop??
in every big patch the same problem.. fu riot
5.8 on 2nd part of patch it was taking up to 17000 file scanning
Help me plz

Calculating differences : 7800 files scanned, left computer to update LoL on patch 5.8 for 40 minutes and the file scanning didn't stop. Does anyone know how to fix this. I did the stuff advised below to try to fix it but it didn't work.
19000 files scanned :D any solutions?

>
> 19000 files scanned :D any solutions?

28452 :D
im up to 16000 files scanned
im now at 2300 and the files wont stop
and it always will say 33%
um today is February 18th 2015 and its doing the scanning thing again
wtf, stuck at 33% with 1960 files scanned{{item:3070}}
2,000 files pshhhh
I how do I find my logs in regards to this problem?
